N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 506.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of services which operates or proposes to operate an
intensive case management, supportive case management or blended ICM/SCM case
management program. (b) This Part
applies to the operation or proposed operation of an intensive case management, supportive case management or blended ICM/SCM case management program for a
client identified as a person with a serious mental illness and enrolled with a
provider of services as follows: (1)
an
intensive case management, supportive case management or blended ICM/SCM case
management program provided by a local government unit or voluntary agency; or
(2)
an intensive case
management, supportive case management or blended ICM/SCM case management
program provided by a provider of service licensed pursuant to article 31 of
the Mental Hygiene Law; or
(3)
an
intensive case management program operated by a State-operated psychiatric
center. Notes
